All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Represents the administrative area of the application, allowing navigation between administrative functionalities such as viewing events and profiles.
AdminUITest
 
AnonymousAuthActivity
Demonstrates anonymous authentication in a Firebase application, allowing users to sign in anonymously and link their account with an email and password later.
Attendee
Activity class for attendee users, managing event display, user authentication, and profile interaction.
AttendeeAdapter
Adapter for RecyclerView to display a list of attendees.
AttendeeAdapter.MyViewHolder
ViewHolder class for attendee items in the RecyclerView.
AttendeeUITest
 
CreateProfile
Fragment for creating a new user profile within the application.
DeleteEventAdmin
A fragment for administrators to delete events.
DeleteProfileAdmin
A fragment class for administrators to delete user profiles.
Event
Represents an event, including details such as date, time, location, and participants.
EventAdapter
Adapter class for managing the display of Event items within a RecyclerView.
EventAdapter.AdapterEventClickListener
Interface for handling click events on items within the RecyclerView.
EventAdapter.MyViewHolder
ViewHolder class for event items within the RecyclerView.
EventAttendees
A Fragment to display event attendees and a map view location.
EventChooseQR
A fragment for choosing an event to generate or reuse a QR code.
EventChooseQR.ChooseQRFragmentListener
Interface for communication with fragments or activities that host this fragment.
EventCreateEdit
Fragment for creating and editing events within the application.
EventDetails
A fragment class to display the details of an event within the application.
EventDetailsAttendee
A fragment for displaying event details to an attendee.
EventRepository
Manages the retrieval and updates of Event data from Firebase Firestore.
EventRepository.EventCallback
Interface defining callbacks for event data loading operations.
eventUnitTest
 
EventViewModel
ViewModel class for managing UI-related data in a lifecycle-conscious way.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
GetUserCallback
Callback interface for receiving the result of a user retrieval operation.
Notification
Represents a notification with a title, message, and timestamp.
NotificationAdapter
Adapter class for RecyclerView to display notifications.
NotificationAdapter.OnNotificationListener
Interface for handling click events on notifications.
NotificationAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class to hold and bind views for each notification item.
NotificationsAttendee
A fragment class that displays notifications to attendees.
NotificationsOrganizer
A fragment for organizing and managing notifications for event organizers within the application.
NotificationTest
Unit tests for the Notification class.
Organizer
Activity for the event organizer, managing the creation, editing, and viewing of events.
OrganizerUITest
 
Profile
A fragment class for displaying and editing the profile of a user.
QRCode
Represents a QR code and provides Bitmap generation for said code
QRCodeTest
 
QRScanner
This scans a QR code and stores its contents
ShareQRFragment
Used to select a desired QR code type to share with other apps
ShareQRFragment.ShareQRDialogListener
Provides Contract between parent fragment and ShareQRFragment to Share a selected QR code
User
Represents a user within the application, including their personal information and their interactions with events.
UserAdapter
Adapter for a RecyclerView that displays a list of Users.
UserAdapter.OnUserListener
Interface for handling click events on users.
UserAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class for RecyclerView items, representing individual users.
UserRepository
Handles data operations for Users, interacting with Firebase Firestore to perform CRUD operations on user data.
UserRepository.UserCallback
Interface for callbacks when user data is loaded or an error occurs.
UserUnitTest
 
UserViewModel
ViewModel for managing UI-related data in a lifecycle-conscious way.
ViewEventsAdmin
A fragment class for administrators to view and manage events.
ViewProfilesAdmin
A fragment for administrators to view and manage user profiles.
